member.name: IBlockRangeList.get_BlockRanges
member.summary: Returns the list of sector ranges in the form of a safe array of variants of type VT_Dispatch.
member.param: List of sector ranges. Each element of the list is a VARIANT of type VT_Dispatch. Query the pdispVal member of the variant for the interface.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

listheader.description:
Failed to allocate the required memory.
Value: 0x8007000E

member.name: IBlockRangeList
member.summary: Use this interface to retrieve a list of continuous sector ranges on the media. This interface is used to describe the sectors that need to be updated on a rewritable disc when a new logical session is recorded.
